inventory=[{"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 13, "index": 13}, {"type": "spruce_leaves", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "music_disc_far", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 4, "index": 26}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}]
thought: To craft bricks, I need to place 4 bricks in a square in the crafting grid. I will start by moving 1 brick from slot 26 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1
